price: Mprε pii na wᴐn a wͻpo nokorε no bεpε sε na anka wͻyε Muslimifoͻ.
arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَوۡ كَانُواْ مُسۡلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rubamā yawaddu alladhīna kafarū law kānū mus'limīna
